titles.title: To extend the minimum wage index established by regulation for each all-urban State under the Medicare inpatient hospital prospective payment system.
To extend the minimum wage index established by regulation for each all-urban State under the Medicare inpatient hospital prospective payment system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Extends the minimum wage index established by regulation for each all-urban state under the inpatient hospital prospective payment system (PPS) under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.
